quote: In 2024, year to date, she has made $60,000 in commissions directly through social media.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the tangible financial benefits of effective social media use.
suggested_hook: Want to turn your social media into a money-making machine?

quote: Someone I hadn't seen in 10 years reached out to me. They want to buy a house with me.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the power of staying top of mind through social media.
suggested_hook: Reconnect with old contacts and turn them into clients!
